bibl.title: Four Greek Ostraka from Thermenmuseum (Heerlen).
bibl.note: About 80 Greek ostraka from Ptolemaic, Roman and Byzantine times are deposited in the Thermenmuseum at Heerlen (Neth.). Edition of 4 Roman ostraka, which do not have the Theban region as their provenance. - 1. Inv. BL 218. 212/13 p. - 2. Inv. BL 345. Edfu, 24.V.103 p. - 3. Inv. BL 334. Edfu, 17.VI.98 p. - 4. Inv. BL 323. Edfu, 28.VI.84 p.
Worp Klaas Anthony, Four Greek Ostraka from Thermenmuseum (Heerlen).
142.4 O. Heerlen Inv. BL 218; BL 323; 334; BL 345
